name: Midcentury High Back Ladder Flowery Fabric Italian Chiavari Side Chairs, 1950

condition.details: Refinished. Reupholstered. Wear consistent with age and use. Restored.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Beautiful pair of "chiavarine" chairs, with a seat dressed in extravagant flowery fabric. High quality of the "Chiavari" chairs in very good original condition. Perfect sculptural side chairs made in "Chiavari" Italy. Particular and original this ladder back, typical of that period and that location. The seat is covered with a flowery fabric coming from "Seterie Cordani" of Zoagli. The chairs would be a perfect complement next to a sideboards or to hang your coat in the dressing room, multifunctional chairs. Restored by the expert hands of our atelier, this item has no defects, but it may show slight traces of use. For each piece, before the departure, a revision is redone, to make sure it arrives in excellent condition.
